title: A Miracle of Aom and Somwang [Thai Movie]
description:
Detail: COMEDY
title: A miracle of Aom Somwang
Starring : Lift Supoj, Oil Thana, Bow Pradthana
Year: 1998
sound: Thai
2 VCDs ]
Thai National Academy awards: Best visual effect
IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0326609/
Info: http://www.ethaicd.com/show.php?pid=157

Story :

When simple guy Somwung (Lift-Supoj)mysteriously switches bodies with superstar Oam (Oil-Thana), their lives are changed forever. Oam begins to learn what life is like for an average person, while Somwung finds out that dark-side of fame, as people try to become famous by meeting him. The two slowly begin to realize that the only person you can be is yourself, but will they ever discover a way back into their original bodies?
